cause.description:
- Lowering the legal drinking age would not only be a lot easier for us minors to obtain alcohol but it would also be easier to get into bars n shit!!! - Alcohol isn't a drug so why not enjoy while your young -
1. Alcohol isn't an illegal drug
2. the legal age to drink and obtain alcohol must be lowered
cause.mission: lower the legal drinking age to 17
cause.name: LoWeR lEgAl DrInKiNg AgE!!!! 17 is the new 19
